title: Missing images
description: Certain images are not displaying on the product detail page

title: Incorrect currency conversion
description: Wrong exchange rate used for conversions

title: Missing data in reports
description: Certain data fields not appearing in generated reports

title: Network connection error
description: The app fails to establish a network connection on some devices

title: UI glitch in settings
description: The settings screen shows overlapping elements and misaligned text

title: Login button not working
description: Clicking on the login button does not trigger any action

title: Broken image in profile
description: The user's profile picture is not displaying properly

title: Search results not updating
description: Entering a new search query does not update the search results

title: Missing validation message
description: Submitting the form without filling in required fields does not show any error message

title: Slow performance on large datasets
description: The application becomes unresponsive when working with large datasets

title: Incorrect sorting order in table
description: The table does not sort the data correctly based on the selected column

title: Error message missing in login form
description: When entering incorrect credentials, no error message is displayed

title: Data loss on refresh
description: Refreshing the page causes unsaved data to be lost

title: Inconsistent font sizes
description: Different sections of the application have varying font sizes
